Package com.betleopard.domain

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bet
    The Bet class models a horse racing bet, which can be either ante post or starting price, and either a simple bet or a traditional accumulator.
    Bet.BetBuilder
    The Builder class for Bet instances
    CentralFactory
    Simple static holder for the factories for various types of domain object
    Event
    An event represents a collection of Race instances - effectively a race meeting.
    Horse
    A simple representation of a horse running in a Race.
    Leg
    A domain object that represents a single leg of a Bet.
    Race
    A domain type that represents an individual race.
    Race.RaceDetails
    An internal handle class that is used to hold the details of a race.
    Race.RaceDetailsBuilder
    Builder class for RaceDetails objects
    User
    A simple domain object that describes a user, ie a person placing a bet.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BetType
    Simple enum of possible bet types
    OddsType
    Simple enum type for possible ways to back a horse
